Vulnerability.Title: shared-mime-info bug fix update
Vulnerability.Description: The shared-mime-info package provides definitions of content (MIME) types based on file names and file contents for end-user applications to use, such as file managers and content indexers. For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.4 Release Notes linked from the References section. Users of shared-mime-info are advised to upgrade to these updated packages. Note for remediation: Please disable the SELinux for RHEL 4/5 when repairing, or some rpm packages will fail to install.
